caption.title: Lake sediment core.
caption.p: a Core photograph showing laminations and shift from organic-poor to organic-rich sediments at c 150 cm core-depth. b Percentage (weight) of organic material loss on ignition (LOI). c Carbon to Nitrogen ratio (C:N). d Log of Cl counts based on X-ray fluorescence (XRF) scanning. e Log Cl:Ti XRF data. f Sedimentation rates. g Modelled median age-depth relationship constructed in BACON. Error bars and dashed lines represent modelled 95% confidence intervals (for dates see Supplementary Table 1).
